column4: how can i get my real ip to show? i have done everything you can do with my router to get it to show and it wont work. what do i do?
no one is going to help me ic
what's your "real ip" the one of your computer or router?
the ip address 24.144.x.x has nothing to do with your computer, only your router, you need to find out if you can query your router somehow
